metadata.title: CVE-2018-20573 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: The Scanner::EnsureTokensInQueue function in yaml-cpp (aka LibYaml-C++) 0.6.2 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (stack consumption and application crash) via a crafted YAML file.

criterions.comment: yaml-cpp package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.6.3-9').
